content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #85840 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #85840 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
Tier 2 target, fairly major regression. P-high at least.
yes, It looks bad but somehow it looks strange to me: I mean, a regression in the standard library for file handling? Let's see if we can get a bit more details
I'm trying hard to have the rustbot run @rustbot ping icebreakers-cleanup-crew but i don't get feedback. I'll wait a few minutes to not spam the issue
(btw it would be great to have a debugging log console or status page for the bot)
